Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a plant that has enough water and light, showing it as healthy and growing.
The student can illustrate a plant without water, showing the effects of lack of water on the plant.
The student can illustrate a plant without light, showing the effects of lack of light on the plant.
The student can show a comparison between healthy plants and those lacking water or light, identifying patterns in their growth.
